title: GBIF Occurrence Download
abstract: A dataset containing 2841975 species occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "or" : [ "TaxonKey is Polygonia comma Harris, 1852", "TaxonKey is Polygonia progne Cramer, 1775", "TaxonKey is Polygonia c-album (Linnaeus, 1758)", "TaxonKey is Polygonia interrogationis Fabricius, 1798", "TaxonKey is Junonia lavinia Cramer, 1775", "TaxonKey is Junonia genoveva (Cramer, 1780)", "TaxonKey is Junonia oenone Linnaeus, 1764", "TaxonKey is Junonia erigone Cramer, 1779", "TaxonKey is Junonia evarete Cramer, 1782", "TaxonKey is Junonia almana Linnaeus, 1758", "TaxonKey is Junonia atlites Linnaeus, 1763", "TaxonKey is Junonia iphita Cramer, 1782", "TaxonKey is Junonia orithya Linnaeus, 1764", "TaxonKey is Junonia hierta Fabricius, 1798", "TaxonKey is Junonia lemonias Linnaeus, 1758", "TaxonKey is Junonia villida Fabricius, 1787", "TaxonKey is Junonia hedonia Linnaeus, 1764", "TaxonKey is Junonia coenia Hübner, 1822", "TaxonKey is Aglais milberti Godart, 1819", "TaxonKey is Aglais urticae (Linnaeus, 1758)", "TaxonKey is Melitaea diamina (Lang, 1789)", "TaxonKey is Melitaea athalia (Rottemburg, 1775)", "TaxonKey is Melitaea cinxia (Linnaeus, 1758)", "TaxonKey is Inachis is Nymphalis antiopa (Linnaeus, 1758)", "TaxonKey is Nymphalis l-album (Esper, 1781)", "TaxonKey is Nymphalis polychloros (Linnaeus, 1758)", "TaxonKey is Vanessa indica Herbst, 1794", "TaxonKey is Vanessa carye (Hübner, 1812)", "TaxonKey is Vanessa annabella (W.D.Field, 1971)", "TaxonKey is Vanessa itea (Fabricius, 1775)", "TaxonKey is Vanessa atalanta (Linnaeus, 1758)", "TaxonKey is Vanessa virginiensis (Drury, 1773)", "TaxonKey is Vanessa kershawi (McCoy, 1868)", "TaxonKey is Vanessa cardui (Linnaeus, 1758)", "TaxonKey is Greta oto Hewitson, 1854", "TaxonKey is Greta dercetis Doubleday, 1847", "TaxonKey is Greta andromica Hewitson, 1854", "TaxonKey is Eutresis hypereia Doubleday, 1847", "TaxonKey is Lycorea ceres Cramer, 1776", "TaxonKey is Amauris niavius Linnaeus, 1758", "TaxonKey is Mechanitis menapis Hewitson, 1855", "TaxonKey is Thyridia psidii Linnaeus, 1758", "TaxonKey is Olyras crathis Doubleday, 1847", "TaxonKey is Tithorea harmonia Cramer, 1779", "TaxonKey is Callithomia lenea Cramer, 1782", "TaxonKey is Hyalyris antea Hewitson, 1869", "TaxonKey is Hyalyris coeno Doubleday, 1847", "TaxonKey is Athesis clearista Doubleday, 1847", "TaxonKey is Pseudoscada timna Hewitson, 1854", "TaxonKey is Godyris kedema Hewitson, 1854", "TaxonKey is Pteronymia artena Hewitson, 1854", "TaxonKey is Pteronymia veia Hewitson, 1852", "TaxonKey is Pteronymia nubivaga Fox, 1947", "TaxonKey is Pteronymia asopo Felder & Felder, 1865", "TaxonKey is Pteronymia aletta Hewitson, 1854" ] }.
